title: Who is IU in Korea? [Music] [Kpop]? - Quora

response.answer_text: Basically uncrowned goddess of Kpop scene!!! She is an extremely accomplished and versatile vocalist, soloist artist and have a credible acting portfolio under her belt. She is one of the very few kpop artists that is well liked and respected by all her peers as well as adored by general population across age group. You should check out her Wiki page if possible for more information because she has impressive list of credentials. It is assumed as a default in music world that if IU is releasing a song - it is going to be an all-kill ( charting as top hit across multiple song platforms) and it is not incorrect - She has an impressive record of 18 all kills till date. She has been active in music scene since almost 16 yrs of age with more recent popularity from her release of IU x Suga collab of song Eight. Her earlier hits include a versatile range of songs from Last night story, Bbibbi, Bleuming, Palette, Autumn morning and dear name just to mention a few. You should check her work if your interested in pop music from Korea.

She is one of the top female solo artists in Korea. She’s been around for over 10 years now and is dubbed the nations little sister. Every song she releases is almost a guaranteed hit on the korean charts.
